description:
The Class Rank DAT extracts data from the [ClassRank] table. Class Rank is setup at Start Page > School Setup > Class Rank > Class Rank Methods. For more information on Class Rank, click on the help icon in the upper right hand corner of the page to access the PowerSchool Help Files.

When creating a class rank method, it is necessary to choose a GPA Calculation Method. For more information on GPAs, navigate to Start Page > District Setup > GPA Calculations > Calculation Methods > select a calculation and then access the PowerSchool Help Files. You may also refer to Knowledgebase article 11148 on PowerSource.

tags.name: Class rank (Based on cumulative weighted GPA)
tags.desc: Inserts the student's class rank. You can use any valid GPA type as the GPA parameter, such as gpa.simple or gpa.percent.

tags.name: Class Rank Result=Rank Of
tags.desc: The Class Rank DAT extracts Rank Of data from the [ClassRank] table.

tags.name: Class Rank Result=Rank Out Of
tags.desc: The Class Rank DAT extracts Rank Out Of data from the [ClassRank] table.

tags.name: Class Rank Method
tags.desc: The Class Rank DAT extracts data from the [ClassRank] table. If the {gpa_method} parameter is omitted, the default “weighted”

tags.name: Class Rank Result=rank
tags.desc: The Class Rank DAT extracts RANK data from the [ClassRank] table.

tags.name: Class Rank Result=Out Of
tags.desc: The Class Rank DAT extracts OUTOF data from the [ClassRank] table.

tags.name: Class Rank Result=GPA
tags.desc: The Class Rank DAT extracts GPA data from the [ClassRank] table.

tags.name: Class Rank Result=School Name
tags.desc: The Class Rank DAT extracts School Name data from the [ClassRank] table.

tags.name: Class Rank Result=Percentile
tags.desc: The Class Rank DAT extracts Percentile data from the [ClassRank] table.

tags.name: Class Rank Percentile Digits
tags.desc: The Class Rank DAT extracts Percentile data with number of decimal places from the [ClassRank] table.
